oauthmodule.actions.custom

Class LoginHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • oauthmodule.actions.custom.LoginHelper

  •  class LoginHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class, which is used to create a Mendix Session, which avoids an additional round trip to the client. Based on XAS 2.4 com.mendix.core.action.{client/user}.LoginAction
